snippet.title: Super Knight World Official Trailer #2
snippet.description:
The second official trailer for 'Super Knight World'.
Get the game now at http://coffeemuggames.itch.io/super-knight-world 
Follow on twitter http://twitter.com/coffeemuggames
or visit our homepage http://coffeemuggames.tumblr.com


An all new retro adventure awaits you in 'Super Knight World'!

Travel to a pixeworld with beautiful and charming enemies, objects and nature. Defeat the baddies with your mighty sword. And collect all the gold and beat the highscore.

Look and feel like in the good old days, when you played your favorite jump and run games on your 8bit console.

Music by Matthew Pablo
http://www.matthewpablo.com
http://www.youtube.com/user/letspretendxc0re
